summary: This document is an email exchange between Paul Morris and Lesley Groff regarding a potential phone call with Jeffrey Epstein. Lesley informs Paul that Jeffrey is not currently available but may be able to arrange a call later. The communication is marked as confidential.

persons.name: Paul Morris

persons.context: Lesley Groff responds to Paul Morris, indicating that Jeffrey Epstein is not available but may be able to arrange a call.
